item.title: Morgan add a quote by Junot Díaz
item.description: "Success, after all, loves a witness, but failure can't exist without one." -- Junot Díaz

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "Do not let your fire go out, spark by irreplaceable spark in the hopeless swamps of the not-quite, the not-yet, and the not-at-all. Do not let the hero in your soul perish in lonely frustration for the life you deserved and have never been able to reach. The world you desire can be won. It exists.. it is real.. it is possible.. it's yours." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Alessandro Baricco
item.description: "This is the seashore. Neither land nor sea. It’s a place that does not exist." -- Alessandro Baricco

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Junot Diaz
item.description: "It's never the changes we want that change everything." -- Junot Diaz

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Junot Díaz
item.description: "Each morning, before Jackie started her studies, she wrote on a clean piece of paper: Tarde venientibus ossa. To the latecomers are left the bones." -- Junot Díaz

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Junot Díaz
item.description: "But if these years have taught me anything it is this: you can never run away. Not ever. The only way out is in." -- Junot Díaz

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Alan Moore
item.description: "My experience of life is that it is not divided up into genres; it’s a horrifying, romantic, tragic, comical, science-fiction cowboy detective novel. You know, with a bit of pornography if you're lucky." -- Alan Moore

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Alan Moore
item.description: "My mother said I broke her heart...but it was my integrity that was important. Is that so selfish? It sells for so little, but it's all we have left in this place. It is the very last inch of us...but within that inch we are free." -- Alan Moore

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "You don't have to burn books to destroy a culture. Just get people to stop reading them." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Morgan add a quote by Patrick Rothfuss
item.description: "Words are pale shadows of forgotten names. As names have power, words have power. Words can light fires in the minds of men. Words can wring tears from the hardest hearts." -- Patrick Rothfuss
